title: Designing Digital Learning Materials for Medical Education: Applying Cognitive Multimedia Learning Theory

context.prior_knowledge: General grasp of foundational pedagogy theories and multimedia tool applications
context.additional_context: Digital transformation competency development program for pre-service/in-service teachers designing medical education materials, assuming smartphone-based tools in limited-technology environments

learning_goals: One can explain the principles for designing medical education PPT slides based on cognitive multimedia learning theory.
One can produce digital learning materials applying core principles such as text-image synchronization and minimizing the split-attention effect.
One can apply visual design strategies that consider learning effectiveness and motivation to real-world cases.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
